name: Push-Ups
how_to_perform:
1. Start in a position with your hands shoulder-width apart and your arms extended fully, engaging your core.
2. Position your feet hip-width apart on the ground, ensuring your body forms a straight line from head to heels.
3. Lower your upper body towards the ground by bending at the elbows and hinging forward, keeping your back straight and avoiding any sagging in the hips.
4. As you lower yourself, keep your arms close to your sides and focus on using your chest muscles.
5. Keep your movements controlled as you press your body up from the ground.

6. Push through the ground with your hands and extend your arms fully, returning to the starting position.
7. Engage your core throughout the entire exercise, drawing your belly button towards your spine.
short_summary: Push-ups are an upper body exercise that involves lying flat on your chest, performing a movement using the arms for support and engaging the core.
